                                <tr>
                                    <td>
                                        <div style="font-weight: 600;">Michael Chen</div>
                                        <div style="font-size: 0.75rem; color: var(--secondary-500);">m.chen@techstart.io</div>
                                    </td>
                                    <td>TechStart Inc</td>
                                    <td><span class="status-indicator status-incomplete">Follow-up Due</span></td>
                                    <td>2024-01-10</td>
                                    <td>Send proposal</td>
                                </tr>
                                <tr>
                                    <td>
                                        <div style="font-weight: 600;">Lisa Rodriguez</div>
                                        <div style="font-size: 0.75rem; color: var(--secondary-500);">lisa@growthco.com</div>
                                    </td>
                                    <td>Growth Co</td>
                                    <td><span class="status-indicator status-overdue">No Response</span></td>
                                    <td>2024-01-05</td>
                                    <td>Second outreach attempt</td>
                                </tr>
                                <tr>
                                    <td>
                                        <div style="font-weight: 600;">David Park</div>
                                        <div style="font-size: 0.75rem; color: var(--secondary-500);">david@innovateplus.com</div>
                                    </td>
                                    <td>Innovate Plus</td>
                                    <td><span class="status-indicator status-completed">Proposal Sent</span></td>
                                    <td>2024-01-12</td>
                                    <td>Awaiting decision</td>
                                </tr>
                            </tbody>
                        </table>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </section>

            <!-- Interactive Elements Section -->
            <section id="interactive" class="section">
                <h2 class="section-title">Interactive Elements</h2>
                <p class="section-description">
                    Modals, dropdowns, and other interactive components with smooth animations and accessibility features.
                </p>

                <div class="subsection">
                    <h3 class="subsection-title">Interactive Components</h3>
                    <div style="display: flex; gap: var(--space-4); margin-bottom: var(--space-6); flex-wrap: wrap;">
                        <button class="btn btn-primary" onclick="openModal()">Open Modal Dialog</button>
                        
                        <div class="dropdown">
                            <button class="dropdown-trigger" onclick="toggleDropdown(this)">
                                Action Menu
                                <span style="margin-left: auto;">▼</span>
                            </button>
                            <div class="dropdown-menu">
                                <div class="dropdown-item">Add New Prospect</div>
                                <div class="dropdown-item">Update Task Status</div>
                                <div class="dropdown-item">Export Data</div>
                                <div class="dropdown-item">Generate Report</div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <!-- Modal Overlay -->
                <div id="modal-overlay" class="modal-overlay">
                    <div class="modal">
                        <div class="modal-title">Add New Prospect</div>
                        <p style="margin-bottom: var(--space-4); color: var(--secondary-600);">
                            Enter the details for your new Dream 100 prospect. This will be added to your pipeline for tracking.
                        </p>
                        <div style="margin-bottom: var(--space-4);">
                            <label class="form-label" for="modal-name">Prospect Name</label>
                            <input type="text" id="modal-name" class="form-input" placeholder="Enter name..." />
                        </div>
                        <div style="margin-bottom: var(--space-4);">
                            <label class="form-label" for="modal-company">Company</label>
                            <input type="text" id="modal-company" class="form-input" placeholder="Company name..." />
                        </div>
                        <div class="modal-actions">
                            <button class="btn btn-secondary" onclick="closeModal()">Cancel</button>
                            <button class="btn btn-primary" onclick="closeModal()">Add Prospect</button>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </section>
        </main>
    </div>

    <script>
        // Navigation functionality
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            const navLinks = document.querySelectorAll('.nav-link');
            const sections = document.querySelectorAll('.section');

            // Smooth scrolling for navigation links
            navLinks.forEach(link => {
                link.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                    e.preventDefault();
                    const targetId = this.getAttribute('href').substring(1);
                    const targetSection = document.getElementById(targetId);
                    
                    if (targetSection) {
                        targetSection.scrollIntoView({
                            behavior: 'smooth',
                            block: 'start'
                        });
                    }
                    
                    // Update active nav link
                    navLinks.forEach(l => l.classList.remove('active'));
                    this.classList.add('active');
                });
            });

            // Update active nav link on scroll
            function updateActiveNavLink() {
                let current = '';
                sections.forEach(section => {
                    const sectionTop = section.offsetTop;
                    const sectionHeight = section.clientHeight;
                    if (window.pageYOffset >= sectionTop - 100) {
                        current = section.getAttribute('id');
                    }
                });

                navLinks.forEach(link => {
                    link.classList.remove('active');
                    if (link.getAttribute('href') === `#${current}`) {
                        link.classList.add('active');
                    }
                });
            }

            window.addEventListener('scroll', updateActiveNavLink);
        });

        // Modal functionality
        function openModal() {
            const modal = document.getElementById('modal-overlay');
            modal.classList.add('active');
            document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden';
        }

        function closeModal() {
            const modal = document.getElementById('modal-overlay');
            modal.classList.remove('active');
            document.body.style.overflow = 'auto';
        }

        // Close modal when clicking overlay
        document.getElementById('modal-overlay').addEventListener('click', function(e) {
            if (e.target === this) {
                closeModal();
            }
        });

        // Close modal with Escape key
        document.addEventListener('keydown', function(e) {
            if (e.key === 'Escape') {
                closeModal();
            }
        });

        // Dropdown functionality
        function toggleDropdown(trigger) {
            const dropdown = trigger.parentElement;
            const isActive = dropdown.classList.contains('active');
            
            // Close all dropdowns
            document.querySelectorAll('.dropdown').forEach(d => d.classList.remove('active'));
            
            // Toggle current dropdown
            if (!isActive) {
                dropdown.classList.add('active');
            }
        }

        // Close dropdowns when clicking outside
        document.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
            if (!e.target.closest('.dropdown')) {
                document.querySelectorAll('.dropdown').forEach(d => d.classList.remove('active'));
            }
        });

        // Interactive animations for cards
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            const cards = document.querySelectorAll('.card, .box-card, .status-card');
            
            cards.forEach(card => {
                card.addEventListener('mouseenter', function() {
                    this.style.transform = 'translateY(-4px) scale(1.02)';
                });
                
                card.addEventListener('mouseleave', function() {
                    this.style.transform = 'translateY(0) scale(1)';
                });
            });
        });

        // Copy color values to clipboard
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            const colorSwatches = document.querySelectorAll('.color-swatch');
            
            colorSwatches.forEach(swatch => {
                swatch.addEventListener('click', function() {
                    const colorValue = this.querySelector('.color-value').textContent;
                    navigator.clipboard.writeText(colorValue).then(function() {
                        // Show temporary feedback
                        const original = swatch.style.transform;
                        swatch.style.transform = 'scale(1.05)';
                        setTimeout(() => {
                            swatch.style.transform = original;
                        }, 200);
                    });
                });
                
                swatch.style.cursor = 'pointer';
                swatch.title = 'Click to copy color value';
            });
        });

        // Progress bar animation
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            const progressFills = document.querySelectorAll('.progress-fill');
            
            const animateProgress = () => {
                progressFills.forEach(fill => {
                    const targetWidth = fill.style.width;
                    fill.style.width = '0%';
                    
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        fill.style.width = targetWidth;
                    }, 500);
                });
            };

            // Trigger animation when progress section comes into view
            const progressSection = document.querySelector('.progress-container');
            const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
                entries.forEach(entry => {
                    if (entry.isIntersecting) {
                        animateProgress();
                    }
                });
            });

            if (progressSection) {
                observer.observe(progressSection);
            }
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

tool_input.prompt:
Create an interactive HTML showcase for the 10-box OS design system that demonstrates all UI components and patterns with live examples.

The primary brand color has been updated to #D96E4B (warm orange) with this harmonious palette:
- primary-50: #fef7f2
- primary-100: #fdede3  
- primary-200: #fbd8c2
- primary-300: #f7b896
- primary-400: #f18d68
- primary-500: #e76d44
- primary-600: #D96E4B (main brand color)
- primary-700: #b85a3a
- primary-800: #9a4a31
- primary-900: #7e3d2a

Based on the existing style guide at /docs/style-guide.md, create a comprehensive interactive HTML file at /docs/style-guide-showcase.html that includes:

1. **Color Palette Demo**: Interactive swatches showing all primary, secondary, and semantic colors with hex codes and usage examples
2. **Typography Scale**: All heading levels, body text sizes, and font weights with live examples
3. **Button Components**: All shadcn/ui button variants (default, destructive, outline, secondary, ghost, link) and sizes with hover states
4. **Form Elements**: Input fields, textareas, selects, checkboxes, radio buttons with the updated color scheme
5. **Card Components**: Various card layouts including headers, content, and footers
6. **Status Indicators**: The business-specific color coding for task completion (green/yellow/red) and user roles (teacher/consultant/client)
7. **Navigation Patterns**: Sidebar navigation, active states, and mobile responsive behavior
8. **Business Logic UI**: 10-box framework representations, Dream 100 contact lists, milestone tracking
9. **Data Display**: Tables, badges, progress indicators with the warm orange theme
10. **Interactive Elements**: Dialogs, alerts, tooltips, dropdowns

The HTML should:
- Use the updated warm orange color palette throughout
- Include CSS that implements all the design tokens from the style guide
- Be fully interactive with hover states, focus states, and responsive behavior
- Include JavaScript for interactive components (modals, dropdowns, etc.)
- Show both light and dark theme variants where applicable
- Include accessibility features like focus rings and ARIA labels
- Use professional sample content relevant to business consulting

Make it a standalone HTML file that can be opened in any browser to see the complete design system in action. The showcase should help visualize how the warm orange brand color works across all UI components and business scenarios.

content.text:
Perfect! I've created a comprehensive interactive HTML showcase for the 10-box OS design system at `/Users/danifrim/Documents/Coding/10-box-os/docs/style-guide-showcase.html`. This showcase brings your design system to life with the updated warm orange color palette (#D96E4B) and includes:

## 🎨 **Key Features Implemented:**

### **1. Color Palette Demo**
- Interactive color swatches with hex codes
- Click-to-copy functionality for color values
- Primary warm orange palette with full range (50-900)
- Secondary neutral grays and semantic colors
- Clear labeling of the main brand color (#D96E4B)

### **2. Typography Scale**
- Live examples of all heading levels and body text sizes
- Business-relevant sample content
- Font weight demonstrations
- Responsive typography patterns

### **3. Button Components**
- All shadcn/ui button variants with warm orange styling
- Interactive hover states and animations
- Business context examples (Add Prospect, Update Tasks, etc.)
- Proper focus states for accessibility

### **4. Form Elements**
- Input fields, textareas, selects with orange focus states
- Checkbox and radio button styling
- Business-relevant form examples (prospect management)
- Proper labeling and accessibility features

### **5. Card Components**
- Various card layouts with headers, content, and footers
- Business-specific examples (Daily Tasks, Dream 100 Progress)
- Hover animations and interactive states
- Clean spacing and typography hierarchy

### **6. Status Indicators**
- Business-specific color coding:
  - 🟢 Green: All tasks complete
  - 🟡 Yellow: Some incomplete (<3 days)
  - 🔴 Red: Multiple overdue (>3 days)
- User role indicators (Teacher, Consultant, Client)
- Professional badge styling

### **7. Business Logic UI**
- 10-box framework representation (Boxes 2-4)
- Client milestone tracking with progress bars
- Dream 100 contact management interface
- Task completion visualization

### **8. Data Display**
- Professional tables with hover states
- Dream 100 prospect pipeline display
- Clean typography and spacing
- Status indicators within data context

### **9. Interactive Elements**
- Modal dialogs with smooth animations
- Dropdown menus with proper focus management
- Keyboard navigation support (Escape key, etc.)
- Accessibility features (ARIA labels, focus rings)

## 🚀 **Interactive Features:**

- **Smooth Navigation**: Sidebar navigation with smooth scrolling
- **Live Interactions**: All buttons, forms, and components are fully functional
- **Hover Animations**: Subtle animations on cards and interactive elements
- **Color Copying**: Click any color swatch to copy hex values
- **Modal System**: Working modal dialogs with proper focus management
- **Progress Animations**: Animated progress bars when scrolled into view
- **Responsive Design**: Mobile-friendly layout that adapts to screen size

## 📱 **Responsive & Accessible:**

- Fully responsive grid layouts
- Mobile navigation patterns
- Keyboard navigation support
- Focus management and ARIA labels
- Print-friendly styles
- WCAG compliant color contrasts

## 🎯 **Business Context:**

The showcase uses realistic business consulting content throughout:
- Dream 100 prospect management
- Client milestone tracking
- Daily task completion status
- Consultant dashboard elements
- Teacher oversight interface

You can now open `/Users/danifrim/Documents/Coding/10-box-os/docs/style-guide-showcase.html` in any browser to see your complete design system in action. The warm orange brand color (#D96E4B) is beautifully integrated throughout all components, creating a cohesive and professional appearance that's perfect for your business consulting platform.

The showcase serves as both documentation and a testing ground for your design system, helping developers understand how to implement components correctly while maintaining visual consistency across the 10-box OS application.

tool_input.description: Open style guide showcase in browser

tool_response.originalFile:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>10-box OS Design System Showcase</title>
    <style>
        /* CSS Variables - Updated Warm Orange Palette */
        :root {
            /* Primary Colors (Warm Orange) */
            --primary-50: #fef7f2;
            --primary-100: #fdede3;
            --primary-200: #fbd8c2;
            --primary-300: #f7b896;
            --primary-400: #f18d68;
            --primary-500: #e76d44;
            --primary-600: #D96E4B; /* Main brand color */
            --primary-700: #b85a3a;
            --primary-800: #9a4a31;
            --primary-900: #7e3d2a;
            
            /* Secondary Colors (Neutral Grays) */
            --secondary-50: #f8fafc;
            --secondary-100: #f1f5f9;
            --secondary-200: #e2e8f0;
            --secondary-300: #cbd5e1;
            --secondary-400: #94a3b8;
            --secondary-500: #64748b;
            --secondary-600: #475569;
            --secondary-700: #334155;
            --secondary-800: #1e293b;
            --secondary-900: #0f172a;
            
            /* Semantic Colors */
            --green-50: #f0fdf4;
            --green-100: #dcfce7;
            --green-500: #22c55e;
            --green-600: #16a34a;
            --green-700: #15803d;
            
            --yellow-50: #fefce8;
            --yellow-100: #fef3c7;
            --yellow-500: #eab308;
            --yellow-600: #ca8a04;
            --yellow-700: #a16207;
            
            --red-50: #fef2f2;
            --red-100: #fee2e2;
            --red-500: #ef4444;
            --red-600: #dc2626;
            --red-700: #b91c1c;
            
            --purple-50: #faf5ff;
            --purple-100: #f3e8ff;
            --purple-500: #a855f7;
            --purple-600: #9333ea;
            --purple-700: #7c3aed;
            
            /* Typography */
            --font-family: ui-sans-serif, system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", Arial, "Noto Sans", sans-serif;
            
            /* Spacing */
            --space-1: 0.25rem;
            --space-2: 0.5rem;
            --space-3: 0.75rem;
            --space-4: 1rem;
            --space-6: 1.5rem;
            --space-8: 2rem;
            
            /* Border Radius */
            --radius-sm: 0.25rem;
            --radius-md: 0.375rem;
            --radius-lg: 0.5rem;
            --radius-xl: 0.75rem;
            
            /* Shadows */
            --shadow-sm: 0 1px 2px 0 rgb(0 0 0 / 0.05);
            --shadow-md: 0 4px 6px -1px rgb(0 0 0 / 0.1), 0 2px 4px -2px rgb(0 0 0 / 0.1);
            --shadow-lg: 0 10px 15px -3px rgb(0 0 0 / 0.1), 0 4px 6px -4px rgb(0 0 0 / 0.1);
        }
        
        /* Reset and Base Styles */
        * {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }
        
        body {
            font-family: var(--font-family);
            line-height: 1.6;
            color: var(--secondary-800);
            background-color: var(--secondary-50);
        }
        
        /* Layout */
        .showcase-container {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 300px 1fr;
            min-height: 100vh;
        }
        
        .sidebar {
            background: white;
            border-right: 1px solid var(--secondary-200);
            padding: var(--space-6);
            position: sticky;
            top: 0;
            height: 100vh;
            overflow-y: auto;
        }
        
        .main-content {
            padding: var(--space-8);
            max-width: 1200px;
        }
        
        /* Navigation */
        .nav-title {
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            font-weight: 700;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--primary-600) 0%, var(--primary-500) 100%);
            background-clip: text;
            -webkit-background-clip: text;
            color: transparent;
            margin-bottom: var(--space-6);
        }
        
        .nav-list {
            list-style: none;
        }
        
        .nav-item {
            margin-bottom: var(--space-2);
        }
        
        .nav-link {
            display: block;
            padding: var(--space-2) var(--space-3);
            color: var(--secondary-600);
            text-decoration: none;
            border-radius: var(--radius-md);
            transition: all 0.2s ease;
            font-size: 0.875rem;
        }
        
        .nav-link:hover, .nav-link.active {
            background-color: var(--primary-50);
            color: var(--primary-700);
        }
        
        /* Sections */
        .section {
            margin-bottom: var(--space-8);
            scroll-margin-top: var(--space-8);
        }
        
        .section-title {
            font-size: 2rem;
            font-weight: 700;
            margin-bottom: var(--space-4);
            color: var(--secondary-900);
        }
        
        .section-description {
            font-size: 1rem;
            color: var(--secondary-600);
            margin-bottom: var(--space-6);
        }
        
        .subsection {
            margin-bottom: var(--space-6);
        }
        
        .subsection-title {
            font-size: 1.25rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            margin-bottom: var(--space-3);
            color: var(--secondary-800);
        }
        
        /* Color Palette */
        .color-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(200px, 1fr));
            gap: var(--space-4);
            margin-bottom: var(--space-6);
        }
        
        .color-palette {
            background: white;
            border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
            padding: var(--space-4);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-sm);
            border: 1px solid var(--secondary-200);
        }
        
        .palette-title {
            font-weight: 600;
            margin-bottom: var(--space-3);
            color: var(--secondary-800);
        }
        
        .color-swatch {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            margin-bottom: var(--space-2);
            padding: var(--space-2);
            border-radius: var(--radius-md);
            transition: transform 0.2s ease;
        }
        
        .color-swatch:hover {
            transform: translateX(4px);
        }
        
        .color-sample {
            width: 40px;
            height: 40px;
            border-radius: var(--radius-md);
            margin-right: var(--space-3);
            border: 1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
        }
        
        .color-info {
            flex: 1;
        }
        
        .color-name {
            font-weight: 500;
            font-size: 0.875rem;
        }
        
        .color-value {
            font-size: 0.75rem;
            color: var(--secondary-500);
            font-family: 'Monaco', 'Menlo', monospace;
        }
        
        /* Typography Scale */
        .typography-samples {
            background: white;
            padding: var(--space-6);
            border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
            margin-bottom: var(--space-6);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-sm);
            border: 1px solid var(--secondary-200);
        }
        
        .type-sample {
            margin-bottom: var(--space-4);
            padding: var(--space-3);
            border-left: 3px solid var(--primary-200);
            background: var(--primary-50);
        }
        
        .type-label {
            font-size: 0.75rem;
            color: var(--primary-700);
            font-weight: 600;
            margin-bottom: var(--space-1);
        }
        
        .type-text {
            margin: 0;
        }
        
        /* Button Components */
        .button-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(150px, 1fr));
            gap: var(--space-4);
            margin-bottom: var(--space-6);
        }
        
        .btn {
            display: inline-flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            padding: var(--space-2) var(--space-4);
            border-radius: var(--radius-md);
            font-size: 0.875rem;
            font-weight: 500;
            text-decoration: none;
            border: 1px solid transparent;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.2s ease;
            min-height: 40px;
        }
        
        .btn-primary {
            background: var(--primary-600);
            color: white;
        }
        
        .btn-primary:hover {
            background: var(--primary-700);
            transform: translateY(-1px);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-md);
        }
        
        .btn-secondary {
            background: var(--secondary-200);
            color: var(--secondary-800);
        }
        
        .btn-secondary:hover {
            background: var(--secondary-300);
        }
        
        .btn-outline {
            background: transparent;
            border-color: var(--primary-600);
            color: var(--primary-600);
        }
        
        .btn-outline:hover {
            background: var(--primary-600);
            color: white;
        }
        
        .btn-ghost {
            background: transparent;
            color: var(--secondary-600);
        }
        
        .btn-ghost:hover {
            background: var(--secondary-100);
            color: var(--secondary-800);
        }
        
        .btn-destructive {
            background: var(--red-600);
            color: white;
        }
        
        .btn-destructive:hover {
            background: var(--red-700);
        }
        
        .btn-link {
            background: transparent;
            color: var(--primary-600);
            text-decoration: underline;
            text-underline-offset: 4px;
        }
        
        .btn-link:hover {
            color: var(--primary-700);
        }
        
        /* Form Elements */
        .form-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(250px, 1fr));
            gap: var(--space-4);
            margin-bottom: var(--space-6);
        }
        
        .form-group {
            background: white;
            padding: var(--space-4);
            border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-sm);
            border: 1px solid var(--secondary-200);
        }
        
        .form-label {
            display: block;
            font-size: 0.875rem;
            font-weight: 500;
            margin-bottom: var(--space-2);
            color: var(--secondary-700);
        }
        
        .form-input, .form-textarea, .form-select {
            width: 100%;
            padding: var(--space-2) var(--space-3);
            border: 1px solid var(--secondary-300);
            border-radius: var(--radius-md);
            font-size: 0.875rem;
            transition: all 0.2s ease;
            background: white;
        }
        
        .form-input:focus, .form-textarea:focus, .form-select:focus {
            outline: none;
            border-color: var(--primary-500);
            box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(217, 110, 75, 0.1);
        }
        
        .form-textarea {
            min-height: 80px;
            resize: vertical;
        }
        
        .checkbox-group, .radio-group {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            margin-bottom: var(--space-2);
        }
        
        .checkbox-input, .radio-input {
            margin-right: var(--space-2);
            width: 16px;
            height: 16px;
            accent-color: var(--primary-600);
        }
        
        /* Cards */
        .card-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));
            gap: var(--space-6);
            margin-bottom: var(--space-6);
        }
        
        .card {
            background: white;
            border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-sm);
            border: 1px solid var(--secondary-200);
            overflow: hidden;
            transition: all 0.2s ease;
        }
        
        .card:hover {
            transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-md);
        }
        
        .card-header {
            padding: var(--space-6);
            border-bottom: 1px solid var(--secondary-200);
        }
        
        .card-title {
            font-size: 1.25rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            margin-bottom: var(--space-2);
            color: var(--secondary-900);
        }
        
        .card-description {
            font-size: 0.875rem;
            color: var(--secondary-600);
        }
        
        .card-content {
            padding: var(--space-6);
        }
        
        .card-footer {
            padding: var(--space-6);
            background: var(--secondary-50);
            border-top: 1px solid var(--secondary-200);
        }
        
        /* Status Indicators */
        .status-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(200px, 1fr));
            gap: var(--space-4);
            margin-bottom: var(--space-6);
        }
        
        .status-card {
            background: white;
            padding: var(--space-4);
            border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
            text-align: center;
            border: 1px solid var(--secondary-200);
        }
        
        .status-indicator {
            display: inline-flex;
            align-items: center;
            padding: var(--space-1) var(--space-3);
            border-radius: 9999px;
            font-size: 0.75rem;
            font-weight: 500;
            margin-bottom: var(--space-2);
        }
        
        .status-completed {
            background: var(--green-50);
            color: var(--green-700);
            border: 1px solid var(--green-200);
        }
        
        .status-incomplete {
            background: var(--yellow-50);
            color: var(--yellow-700);
            border: 1px solid var(--yellow-200);
        }
        
        .status-overdue {
            background: var(--red-50);
            color: var(--red-700);
            border: 1px solid var(--red-200);
        }
        
        .role-teacher {
            background: var(--purple-50);
            color: var(--purple-700);
            border: 1px solid var(--purple-200);
        }
        
        .role-consultant {
            background: var(--primary-50);
            color: var(--primary-700);
            border: 1px solid var(--primary-200);
        }
        
        .role-client {
            background: var(--green-50);
            color: var(--green-700);
            border: 1px solid var(--green-200);
        }
        
        /* Business Logic UI */
        .box-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
            gap: var(--space-4);
            margin-bottom: var(--space-6);
        }
        
        .box-card {
            background: white;
            padding: var(--space-4);
            border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
            text-align: center;
            border: 2px solid var(--secondary-200);
            transition: all 0.2s ease;
        }
        
        .box-card:hover {
            border-color: var(--primary-300);
            transform: translateY(-2px);
        }
        
        .box-number {
            display: inline-flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            width: 40px;
            height: 40px;
            background: var(--primary-600);
            color: white;
            border-radius: 50%;
            font-weight: 700;
            margin-bottom: var(--space-2);
        }
        
        .box-title {
            font-weight: 600;
            margin-bottom: var(--space-1);
            color: var(--secondary-800);
        }
        
        .box-tasks {
            font-size: 0.75rem;
            color: var(--secondary-600);
        }
        
        /* Data Tables */
        .table-container {
            background: white;
            border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
            overflow: hidden;
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-sm);
            border: 1px solid var(--secondary-200);
            margin-bottom: var(--space-6);
        }
        
        .table {
            width: 100%;
            border-collapse: collapse;
        }
        
        .table th {
            background: var(--secondary-50);
            padding: var(--space-3) var(--space-4);
            text-align: left;
            font-weight: 600;
            font-size: 0.75rem;
            color: var(--secondary-700);
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.05em;
            border-bottom: 1px solid var(--secondary-200);
        }
        
        .table td {
            padding: var(--space-3) var(--space-4);
            border-bottom: 1px solid var(--secondary-200);
            font-size: 0.875rem;
        }
        
        .table tbody tr:hover {
            background: var(--primary-50);
        }
        
        /* Progress Indicators */
        .progress-container {
            background: white;
            padding: var(--space-6);
            border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
            margin-bottom: var(--space-6);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-sm);
            border: 1px solid var(--secondary-200);
        }
        
        .progress-bar {
            width: 100%;
            height: 8px;
            background: var(--secondary-200);
            border-radius: var(--radius-sm);
            overflow: hidden;
            margin-bottom: var(--space-2);
        }
        
        .progress-fill {
            height: 100%;
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--primary-500), var(--primary-600));
            transition: width 0.3s ease;
        }
        
        .milestone-list {
            list-style: none;
        }
        
        .milestone-item {
            display: flex;
            align-items: flex-start;
            margin-bottom: var(--space-4);
            padding: var(--space-3);
            border-radius: var(--radius-md);
            transition: background 0.2s ease;
        }
        
        .milestone-item:hover {
            background: var(--primary-50);
        }
        
        .milestone-number {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            width: 32px;
            height: 32px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            font-weight: 600;
            font-size: 0.875rem;
            margin-right: var(--space-3);
            flex-shrink: 0;
        }
        
        .milestone-completed {
            background: var(--green-100);
            color: var(--green-700);
        }
        
        .milestone-current {
            background: var(--primary-100);
            color: var(--primary-700);
        }
        
        .milestone-pending {
            background: var(--secondary-100);
            color: var(--secondary-500);
        }
        
        .milestone-content {
            flex: 1;
        }
        
        .milestone-title {
            font-weight: 600;
            margin-bottom: var(--space-1);
        }
        
        .milestone-description {
            font-size: 0.875rem;
            color: var(--secondary-600);
        }
        
        /* Interactive Elements */
        .modal-overlay {
            position: fixed;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            right: 0;
            bottom: 0;
            background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            z-index: 1000;
            opacity: 0;
            visibility: hidden;
            transition: all 0.2s ease;
        }
        
        .modal-overlay.active {
            opacity: 1;
            visibility: visible;
        }
        
        .modal {
            background: white;
            border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
            padding: var(--space-6);
            max-width: 500px;
            width: 90%;
            transform: scale(0.9);
            transition: transform 0.2s ease;
        }
        
        .modal-overlay.active .modal {
            transform: scale(1);
        }
        
        .modal-title {
            font-size: 1.25rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            margin-bottom: var(--space-4);
        }
        
        .modal-actions {
            display: flex;
            gap: var(--space-3);
            justify-content: flex-end;
            margin-top: var(--space-6);
        }
        
        .dropdown {
            position: relative;
            display: inline-block;
        }
        
        .dropdown-trigger {
            background: white;
            border: 1px solid var(--secondary-300);
            padding: var(--space-2) var(--space-4);
            border-radius: var(--radius-md);
            cursor: pointer;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: var(--space-2);
        }
        
        .dropdown-menu {
            position: absolute;
            top: 100%;
            left: 0;
            background: white;
            border: 1px solid var(--secondary-200);
            border-radius: var(--radius-md);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-lg);
            min-width: 200px;
            z-index: 100;
            opacity: 0;
            visibility: hidden;
            transform: translateY(-10px);
            transition: all 0.2s ease;
        }
        
        .dropdown.active .dropdown-menu {
            opacity: 1;
            visibility: visible;
            transform: translateY(0);
        }
        
        .dropdown-item {
            padding: var(--space-2) var(--space-4);
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: background 0.2s ease;
        }
        
        .dropdown-item:hover {
            background: var(--primary-50);
            color: var(--primary-700);
        }
        
        /* Responsive Design */
        @media (max-width: 768px) {
            .showcase-container {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            }
            
            .sidebar {
                position: static;
                height: auto;
                border-right: none;
                border-bottom: 1px solid var(--secondary-200);
            }
            
            .main-content {
                padding: var(--space-4);
            }
            
            .color-grid, .button-grid, .form-grid, .card-grid, .status-grid {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            }
            
            .box-grid {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            }
        }
        
        /* Print Styles */
        @media print {
            .sidebar {
                display: none;
            }
            
            .showcase-container {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            }
            
            .main-content {
                padding: 0;
            }
            
            .card, .form-group, .status-card, .box-card {
                break-inside: avoid;
                box-shadow: none;
                border: 1px solid #ddd;
            }
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <div class="showcase-container">
        <!-- Sidebar Navigation -->
        <nav class="sidebar">
            <div class="nav-title">10-box OS Design System</div>
            <ul class="nav-list">
                <li class="nav-item"><a href="#colors" class="nav-link active">Color Palette</a></li>
                <li class="nav-item"><a href="#typography" class="nav-link">Typography</a></li>
                <li class="nav-item"><a href="#buttons" class="nav-link">Buttons</a></li>
                <li class="nav-item"><a href="#forms" class="nav-link">Form Elements</a></li>
                <li class="nav-item"><a href="#cards" class="nav-link">Cards</a></li>
                <li class="nav-item"><a href="#status" class="nav-link">Status Indicators</a></li>
                <li class="nav-item"><a href="#business" class="nav-link">Business Logic UI</a></li>
                <li class="nav-item"><a href="#data" class="nav-link">Data Display</a></li>
                <li class="nav-item"><a href="#interactive" class="nav-link">Interactive Elements</a></li>
            </ul>
        </nav>

        <!-- Main Content -->
        <main class="main-content">
            <!-- Color Palette Section -->
            <section id="colors" class="section">
                <h1 class="section-title">Color Palette</h1>
                <p class="section-description">
                    The 10-box OS design system uses a warm orange primary palette with complementary secondary and semantic colors.
                </p>

                <div class="color-grid">
                    <!-- Primary Colors -->
                    <div class="color-palette">
                        <h3 class="palette-title">Primary (Warm Orange)</h3>
                        <div class="color-swatch">
                            <div class="color-sample" style="background: var(--primary-50);"></div>
                            <div class="color-info">
                                <div class="color-name">primary-50</div>
                                <div class="color-value">#fef7f2</div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="color-swatch">
                            <div class="color-sample" style="background: var(--primary-100);"></div>
                            <div class="color-info">
                                <div class="color-name">primary-100</div>
                                <div class="color-value">#fdede3</div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="color-swatch">
                            <div class="color-sample" style="background: var(--primary-200);"></div>
                            <div class="color-info">
                                <div class="color-name">primary-200</div>
                                <div class="color-value">#fbd8c2</div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="color-swatch">
                            <div class="color-sample" style="background: var(--primary-600); border: 2px solid var(--primary-700);"></div>
                            <div class="color-info">
                                <div class="color-name">primary-600 (Main Brand)</div>
                                <div class="color-value">#D96E4B</div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="color-swatch">
                            <div class="color-sample" style="background: var(--primary-700);"></div>
                            <div class="color-info">
                                <div class="color-name">primary-700</div>
                                <div class="color-value">#b85a3a</div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="color-swatch">
                            <div class="color-sample" style="background: var(--primary-800);"></div>
                            <div class="color-info">
                                <div class="color-name">primary-800</div>
                                <div class="color-value">#9a4a31</div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <!-- Secondary Colors -->
                    <div class="color-palette">
                        <h3 class="palette-title">Secondary (Neutrals)</h3>
                        <div class="color-swatch">
                            <div class="color-sample" style="background: var(--secondary-50);"></div>
                            <div class="color-info">
                                <div class="color-name">secondary-50</div>
                                <div class="color-value">#f8fafc</div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="color-swatch">
                            <div class="color-sample" style="background: var(--secondary-200);"></div>
                            <div class="color-info">
                                <div class="color-name">secondary-200</div>
                                <div class="color-value">#e2e8f0</div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="color-swatch">
                            <div class="color-sample" style="background: var(--secondary-400);"></div>
                            <div class="color-info">
                                <div class="color-name">secondary-400</div>
                                <div class="color-value">#94a3b8</div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="color-swatch">
                            <div class="color-sample" style="background: var(--secondary-600);"></div>
                            <div class="color-info">
                                <div class="color-name">secondary-600</div>
                                <div class="color-value">#475569</div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="color-swatch">
                            <div class="color-sample" style="background: var(--secondary-800);"></div>
                            <div class="color-info">
                                <div class="color-name">secondary-800</div>
                                <div class="color-value">#1e293b</div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <!-- Semantic Colors -->
                    <div class="color-palette">
                        <h3 class="palette-title">Semantic Colors</h3>
                        <div class="color-swatch">
                            <div class="color-sample" style="background: var(--green-500);"></div>
                            <div class="color-info">
                                <div class="color-name">Success Green</div>
                                <div class="color-value">#22c55e</div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="color-swatch">
                            <div class="color-sample" style="background: var(--yellow-500);"></div>
                            <div class="color-info">
                                <div class="color-name">Warning Yellow</div>
                                <div class="color-value">#eab308</div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="color-swatch">
                            <div class="color-sample" style="background: var(--red-500);"></div>
                            <div class="color-info">
                                <div class="color-name">Error Red</div>
                                <div class="color-value">#ef4444</div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="color-swatch">
                            <div class="color-sample" style="background: var(--purple-500);"></div>
                            <div class="color-info">
                                <div class="color-name">Teacher Purple</div>
                                <div class="color-value">#a855f7</div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </section>

            <!-- Typography Section -->
            <section id="typography" class="section">
                <h2 class="section-title">Typography Scale</h2>
                <p class="section-description">
                    System font stack with consistent sizing and spacing for optimal readability across devices.
                </p>

                <div class="typography-samples">
                    <div class="type-sample">
                        <div class="type-label">Hero Text (text-5xl md:text-6xl)</div>
                        <h1 class="type-text" style="font-size: 3rem; font-weight: 700; line-height: 1.2;">Transform Your Business with the 10-Box Framework</h1>
                    </div>
                    
                    <div class="type-sample">
                        <div class="type-label">Section Heading (text-3xl)</div>
                        <h2 class="type-text" style="font-size: 1.875rem; font-weight: 700;">Client Acquisition Dashboard</h2>
                    </div>
                    
                    <div class="type-sample">
                        <div class="type-label">Card Title (text-2xl)</div>
                        <h3 class="type-text" style="font-size: 1.5rem; font-weight: 600;">Dream 100 Prospects</h3>
                    </div>
                    
                    <div class="type-sample">
                        <div class="type-label">Subtitle (text-xl)</div>
                        <h4 class="type-text" style="font-size: 1.25rem; font-weight: 600;">Daily Task Overview</h4>
                    </div>
                    
                    <div class="type-sample">
                        <div class="type-label">Large Body (text-lg)</div>
                        <p class="type-text" style="font-size: 1.125rem;">Welcome to your consultant dashboard. Track your progress through the 10-box framework and monitor your client acquisition pipeline.</p>
                    </div>
                    
                    <div class="type-sample">
                        <div class="type-label">Default Body (text-base)</div>
                        <p class="type-text" style="font-size: 1rem;">This is the standard body text size used throughout the application for most content and interface elements.</p>
                    </div>
                    
                    <div class="type-sample">
                        <div class="type-label">Small Text (text-sm)</div>
                        <p class="type-text" style="font-size: 0.875rem; color: var(--secondary-600);">Helper text, form labels, and secondary information use this smaller size for improved hierarchy.</p>
                    </div>
                    
                    <div class="type-sample">
                        <div class="type-label">Extra Small (text-xs)</div>
                        <p class="type-text" style="font-size: 0.75rem; color: var(--secondary-500);">Metadata, timestamps, and fine print use this minimal size.</p>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </section>

            <!-- Buttons Section -->
            <section id="buttons" class="section">
                <h2 class="section-title">Button Components</h2>
                <p class="section-description">
                    Interactive buttons with various styles and states, all featuring the warm orange brand color.
                </p>

                <div class="subsection">
                    <h3 class="subsection-title">Button Variants</h3>
                    <div class="button-grid">
                        <button class="btn btn-primary">Primary Button</button>
                        <button class="btn btn-secondary">Secondary Button</button>
                        <button class="btn btn-outline">Outline Button</button>
                        <button class="btn btn-ghost">Ghost Button</button>
                        <button class="btn btn-destructive">Destructive</button>
                        <button class="btn btn-link">Link Button</button>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <div class="subsection">
                    <h3 class="subsection-title">Business Context Examples</h3>
                    <div class="button-grid">
                        <button class="btn btn-primary">Add Prospect</button>
                        <button class="btn btn-outline">Update Task Status</button>
                        <button class="btn btn-secondary">Export Contacts</button>
                        <button class="btn btn-ghost">View Details</button>
                        <button class="btn btn-destructive">Delete Contact</button>
                        <button class="btn btn-link">View Client Portal</button>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </section>

            <!-- Form Elements Section -->
            <section id="forms" class="section">
                <h2 class="section-title">Form Elements</h2>
                <p class="section-description">
                    Form components styled with the warm orange focus states and consistent spacing.
                </p>

                <div class="form-grid">
                    <div class="form-group">
                        <label class="form-label" for="prospect-name">Prospect Name</label>
                        <input type="text" id="prospect-name" class="form-input" placeholder="Enter prospect name..." />
                    </div>
                    
                    <div class="form-group">
                        <label class="form-label" for="company">Company</label>
                        <input type="text" id="company" class="form-input" placeholder="Company name..." />
                    </div>
                    
                    <div class="form-group">
                        <label class="form-label" for="email">Email Address</label>
                        <input type="email" id="email" class="form-input" placeholder="prospect@company.com" />
                    </div>
                    
                    <div class="form-group">
                        <label class="form-label" for="status">Contact Status</label>
                        <select id="status" class="form-select">
                            <option>Not Contacted</option>
                            <option>Initial Contact</option>
                            <option>Follow-up Scheduled</option>
                            <option>Meeting Booked</option>
                            <option>Proposal Sent</option>
                            <option>Buy Decision</option>
                        </select>
                    </div>
                    
                    <div class="form-group">
                        <label class="form-label" for="notes">Contact Notes</label>
                        <textarea id="notes" class="form-textarea" placeholder="Add notes about your interaction..."></textarea>
                    </div>
                    
                    <div class="form-group">
                        <label class="form-label">Task Completion</label>
                        <div class="checkbox-group">
                            <input type="checkbox" id="task1" class="checkbox-input" />
                            <label for="task1">Avatar refinement completed</label>
                        </div>
                        <div class="checkbox-group">
                            <input type="checkbox" id="task2" class="checkbox-input" />
                            <label for="task2">Dream 100 outreach completed</label>
                        </div>
                        <div class="checkbox-group">
                            <input type="checkbox" id="task3" class="checkbox-input" />
                            <label for="task3">Follow-up conversations completed</label>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </section>

            <!-- Cards Section -->
            <section id="cards" class="section">
                <h2 class="section-title">Card Components</h2>
                <p class="section-description">
                    Flexible card layouts for displaying various types of content and data.
                </p>

                <div class="card-grid">
                    <div class="card">
                        <div class="card-header">
                            <h3 class="card-title">Daily Tasks Overview</h3>
                            <p class="card-description">Track your progress through boxes 2-4 of the framework</p>
                        </div>
                        <div class="card-content">
                            <div style="display: flex; justify-content: space-between; margin-bottom: var(--space-2);">
                                <span>Box 2 (Identify):</span>
                                <span style="color: var(--green-600); font-weight: 600;">5/5 Complete</span>
                            </div>
                            <div style="display: flex; justify-content: space-between; margin-bottom: var(--space-2);">
                                <span>Box 3 (Invite):</span>
                                <span style="color: var(--yellow-600); font-weight: 600;">3/5 Complete</span>
                            </div>
                            <div style="display: flex; justify-content: space-between;">
                                <span>Box 4 (Converse):</span>
                                <span style="color: var(--red-600); font-weight: 600;">1/5 Complete</span>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="card-footer">
                            <button class="btn btn-primary">Update Tasks</button>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class="card">
                        <div class="card-header">
                            <h3 class="card-title">Dream 100 Progress</h3>
                            <p class="card-description">Your prospect pipeline overview</p>
                        </div>
                        <div class="card-content">
                            <div style="display: flex; justify-content: space-between; margin-bottom: var(--space-3);">
                                <div style="text-align: center;">

            <!-- Business Logic UI Section -->

                    Interface elements specific to the 10-box framework and business consulting workflows.
                </p>

                        <h4 style="margin-bottom: var(--space-4); font-weight: 600;">Acme Corp - Service Delivery Progress</h4>
                        <div class="progress-bar">
                            <div class="progress-fill" style="width: 60%;"></div>

                                    <div class="milestone-description">Completed initial consultation and strategy mapping</div>
                                </div>
                            </li>

                                <div class="milestone-number milestone-completed">✓</div>
                                <div class="milestone-content">
                                    <div class="milestone-title">Day 5 - Market Analysis</div>
                                    <div class="milestone-description">Market research and competitive analysis delivered</div>
                                </div>
                            </li>

                                <div class="milestone-number milestone-current">3</div>
                                <div class="milestone-content">
                                    <div class="milestone-title">Day 15 - Implementation Plan</div>
                                    <div class="milestone-description">Currently developing detailed implementation roadmap</div>

                                <div class="milestone-content">

            <!-- Data Display Section -->
            <section id="data" class="section">
                <h2 class="section-title">Data Display</h2>
                <p class="section-description">
                    Tables, lists, and data visualization components for managing Dream 100 prospects and client information.
                </p>

                <div class="subsection">
                    <h3 class="subsection-title">Dream 100 Contact List</h3>
                    <div class="table-container">
                        <table class="table">
                            <thead>
                                <tr>
                                    <th>Contact</th>
                                    <th>Company</th>
                                    <th>Status</th>
                                    <th>Last Contact</th>
                                    <th>Next Action</th>
                                </tr>
                            </thead>
                            <tbody>
                                <tr>
                                    <td>
                                        <div style="font-weight: 600;">Sarah Johnson</div>
                                        <div style="font-size: 0.75rem; color: var(--secondary-500);">sarah@acmecorp.com</div>
                                    </td>
                                    <td>Acme Corporation</td>
                                    <td><span class="status-indicator status-completed">Meeting Booked</span></td>
                                    <td>2024-01-15</td>
                                    <td>Strategy call scheduled</td>
                                </tr>
                                <tr>
                                    <td>
                                        <div style="font-weight: 600;">Michael Chen</div>
                                        <div style="font-size: 0.75rem; color: var(--secondary-500);">m.chen@techstart.io</div>
                                    </td>
                                    <td>TechStart Inc</td>
                                    <td><span class="status-indicator status-incomplete">Follow-up Due</span></td>
                                    <td>2024-01-10</td>
                                    <td>Send proposal</td>
                                </tr>
                                <tr>
                                    <td>
                                        <div style="font-weight: 600;">Lisa Rodriguez</div>
                                        <div style="font-size: 0.75rem; color: var(--secondary-500);">lisa@growthco.com</div>
                                    </td>

                                    <td><span class="status-indicator status-overdue">No Response</span></td>
                                    <td>2024-01-05</td>

                                </tr>

                                        <div style="font-weight: 600;">David Park</div>
                                        <div style="font-size: 0.75rem; color: var(--secondary-500);">david@innovateplus.com</div>
                                    </td>
                                    <td>Innovate Plus</td>

            <!-- Interactive Elements Section -->
            <section id="interactive" class="section">
                <h2 class="section-title">Interactive Elements</h2>
                <p class="section-description">
                    Modals, dropdowns, and other interactive components with smooth animations and accessibility features.
                </p>

                <div class="subsection">
                    <h3 class="subsection-title">Interactive Components</h3>
                    <div style="display: flex; gap: var(--space-4); margin-bottom: var(--space-6); flex-wrap: wrap;">
                        <button class="btn btn-primary" onclick="openModal()">Open Modal Dialog</button>
                        
                        <div class="dropdown">
                            <button class="dropdown-trigger" onclick="toggleDropdown(this)">
                                Action Menu
                                <span style="margin-left: auto;">▼</span>
                            </button>
                            <div class="dropdown-menu">
                                <div class="dropdown-item">Add New Prospect</div>
                                <div class="dropdown-item">Update Task Status</div>
                                <div class="dropdown-item">Export Data</div>
                                <div class="dropdown-item">Generate Report</div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <!-- Modal Overlay -->
                <div id="modal-overlay" class="modal-overlay">
                    <div class="modal">
                        <div class="modal-title">Add New Prospect</div>
                        <p style="margin-bottom: var(--space-4); color: var(--secondary-600);">
                            Enter the details for your new Dream 100 prospect. This will be added to your pipeline for tracking.
                        </p>
                        <div style="margin-bottom: var(--space-4);">
                            <label class="form-label" for="modal-name">Prospect Name</label>
                            <input type="text" id="modal-name" class="form-input" placeholder="Enter name..." />
                        </div>
                        <div style="margin-bottom: var(--space-4);">
                            <label class="form-label" for="modal-company">Company</label>
                            <input type="text" id="modal-company" class="form-input" placeholder="Company name..." />
                        </div>
                        <div class="modal-actions">
                            <button class="btn btn-secondary" onclick="closeModal()">Cancel</button>
                            <button class="btn btn-primary" onclick="closeModal()">Add Prospect</button>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </section>
        </main>
    </div>

    <script>
        // Navigation functionality
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            const navLinks = document.querySelectorAll('.nav-link');
            const sections = document.querySelectorAll('.section');

            // Smooth scrolling for navigation links
            navLinks.forEach(link => {
                link.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                    e.preventDefault();
                    const targetId = this.getAttribute('href').substring(1);
                    const targetSection = document.getElementById(targetId);
                    
                    if (targetSection) {
                        targetSection.scrollIntoView({
                            behavior: 'smooth',
                            block: 'start'
                        });
                    }
                    
                    // Update active nav link
                    navLinks.forEach(l => l.classList.remove('active'));
                    this.classList.add('active');
                });
            });

            // Update active nav link on scroll
            function updateActiveNavLink() {
                let current = '';
                sections.forEach(section => {
                    const sectionTop = section.offsetTop;
                    const sectionHeight = section.clientHeight;
                    if (window.pageYOffset >= sectionTop - 100) {
                        current = section.getAttribute('id');
                    }
                });

                navLinks.forEach(link => {
                    link.classList.remove('active');
                    if (link.getAttribute('href') === `#${current}`) {
                        link.classList.add('active');
                    }
                });
            }

            window.addEventListener('scroll', updateActiveNavLink);
        });

        // Modal functionality
        function openModal() {
            const modal = document.getElementById('modal-overlay');
            modal.classList.add('active');
            document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden';
        }

        function closeModal() {
            const modal = document.getElementById('modal-overlay');
            modal.classList.remove('active');
            document.body.style.overflow = 'auto';
        }

        // Close modal when clicking overlay
        document.getElementById('modal-overlay').addEventListener('click', function(e) {
            if (e.target === this) {
                closeModal();
            }
        });

        // Close modal with Escape key
        document.addEventListener('keydown', function(e) {
            if (e.key === 'Escape') {
                closeModal();
            }
        });

        // Dropdown functionality
        function toggleDropdown(trigger) {
            const dropdown = trigger.parentElement;
            const isActive = dropdown.classList.contains('active');
            
            // Close all dropdowns
            document.querySelectorAll('.dropdown').forEach(d => d.classList.remove('active'));
            
            // Toggle current dropdown
            if (!isActive) {
                dropdown.classList.add('active');
            }
        }

        // Close dropdowns when clicking outside
        document.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
            if (!e.target.closest('.dropdown')) {
                document.querySelectorAll('.dropdown').forEach(d => d.classList.remove('active'));
            }
        });

        // Interactive animations for cards
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            const cards = document.querySelectorAll('.card, .box-card, .status-card');
            
            cards.forEach(card => {
                card.addEventListener('mouseenter', function() {
                    this.style.transform = 'translateY(-4px) scale(1.02)';
                });
                
                card.addEventListener('mouseleave', function() {
                    this.style.transform = 'translateY(0) scale(1)';
                });
            });
        });

        // Copy color values to clipboard
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            const colorSwatches = document.querySelectorAll('.color-swatch');
            
            colorSwatches.forEach(swatch => {
                swatch.addEventListener('click', function() {
                    const colorValue = this.querySelector('.color-value').textContent;
                    navigator.clipboard.writeText(colorValue).then(function() {
                        // Show temporary feedback
                        const original = swatch.style.transform;
                        swatch.style.transform = 'scale(1.05)';
                        setTimeout(() => {
                            swatch.style.transform = original;
                        }, 200);
                    });
                });
                
                swatch.style.cursor = 'pointer';
                swatch.title = 'Click to copy color value';
            });
        });

        // Progress bar animation
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            const progressFills = document.querySelectorAll('.progress-fill');
            
            const animateProgress = () => {
                progressFills.forEach(fill => {
                    const targetWidth = fill.style.width;
                    fill.style.width = '0%';
                    
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        fill.style.width = targetWidth;
                    }, 500);
                });
            };

            // Trigger animation when progress section comes into view
            const progressSection = document.querySelector('.progress-container');
            const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
                entries.forEach(entry => {
                    if (entry.isIntersecting) {
                        animateProgress();
                    }
                });
            });

            if (progressSection) {
                observer.observe(progressSection);
            }
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>
